eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Maricopa, AZ; AT 09:04 PM ON DEC 05, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 05:04 AM DEC 06, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
A SAFE Alert has been issued for Mesa, Arizona. This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. Mesa Police Department is looking for 74-year-old Linda Sue Hanes. Linda is 5 feet 3 inches tall and 115 pounds with brown hair and green eyes. She was last seen on 12/05/2025 at 10:07 AM in the area of Rio Saldo Parkway and Evergreen Street in Mesa, Arizona. Linda was wearing a long black gown, white tennis shoes, greenish/blue prescription glasses. She was wearing several rings on her hand and may be wearing a black overcoat. Linda suffers from a medical condition which may cause her to be lost or easily confused. If you have any information on Linda, please contact Mesa Police. 

If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
